title: january 6: figure skating gets violent
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about one of the biggest scandals in 90’s athletics: when someone associated with Tonya Harding clubbed Nancy Kerrigan in the knees before a big competition. She also talks about the final season of America’s most popular music competition. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
